$$

$$

$$
= \sum_{i=1}^{n}(\sum_{l=1}^{i}\sum_{r=i}^ns[r] - \sum_{l=1}^{i}\sum_{r=i}^ns[l - 1])
$$

$$
= \sum_{i=1}^{n}(\sum_{l=1}^{i}\sum_{r=i}^ns[r] - \sum_{r=i}^{n}\sum_{l=1}^is[l - 1])
$$

$$
= \sum_{i=1}^{n}(i * \sum_{r=i}^ns[r] - (n - i + 1) * \sum_{l=1}^is[l - 1])
